reviews.text: This hotel is ideally located for the centre of Kendal. The rooms are immaculate and the breakfasts too die for,sets you up nicely for your day ahead. Overall very good value for money.
reviews.title: excellent accomodation and hosts

reviews.text: They also take larger parties ie groups of walkers or as we were a touring squash club every one said they could not fault the hotel or the hospitality given.
reviews.title: Friendly and professional!
